name: Jemberu Demeke
description:
'''Jedidya Wondwossen''' ([[Amharic]]: ጂዲዲያ ዎንዶዎሰን; born 2000), known by his stage name '''Jemberu Demeke''' ([[Amharic]]: ጀምበሩ ደመቀ), is an Ethiopian singer, producer and rapper known for his mixing Amharic [[Rapping|rap]], [[trap music]], and samples from various contemporary styles. 

He is widely known for his eponymous EP ''Jemberu Demeke'' (2022) and ''Esatu Se'' (2024), as well as his songs, "Ayferam Gam Ayferam", "Adwa"  and  "Teff Teff (Hustle Grind)" featuring fellow rapper UNO.
